description:
Triggers a workflow as you type individual keystrokes into an input with a configurable delay, similar to the native searchbox input.

The Problem:
The only way to listen to an input's value change is on the "blur" event, when you remove focus from the input.

Use Cases:
- Autocomplete search

Adjustable 'timeout' lets you define how long between keystrokes the workflow should trigger.
name: Trigger Workflow On Type
plugin_instructions:
1) Add the 'input watcher' element to your page

2) Set the text_input value to your element

3) Use the new workflow trigger "Input Monitor has changed"
